ibis.expr.api.StringValue.rlike¶

StringValue.rlike(arg, pattern)¶

Search string values using a regular expression. Returns True if the regex matches a string and False otherwise.

Parameters:pattern : string (regular expression string)
Returns:searched : boolean value
